quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Word and Language
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, amazon, grotesque. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: The Amazon estuary is truly magnificent. The word estuary comes from this language.
A good sense of humor is highly valued everywhere. The original meaning of the word humor in Latin (more accurately umor) is this.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Body fluid

questions.question: The original meaning of the word grotesque was very different from the one we know. What was it?
The Greek word kome means hair of the head. Which one of these words derives from it?
After a divorce, the court might order one of the sides to pay an alimony. What are the origins of the word alimony?
The word nice is very popular nowadays, but its original meaning in Latin is not as nice.
The word devil is derived from the Greek word diabolos. What does diabolos mean?
The longest word in the English language is pneumonoultramicroscopicsilicovolcanoconiosis. It consists of 45 letters and stands for this.
The word razzmatazz means this.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ambiguous language

questions.question: The name of the flower dandelion comes from this language.
A nap in the early afternoon is called by this word taken from Spanish.
This constellation was named after a Greek goddess. She was beautiful, but conceited. In order to punish her for that, Poseidon sent her figure to the skies upside down.
Crwth is a fascinating word. It has no vowels. This is what it means.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Musical instrument

questions.question: One of the following words is a synonym of the word cognoscente.
The she-goat Amalthea, which nursed baby Zeus, is represented by what constellation?

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Constellation and Jupiter
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, mean, hew. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What does the verb to dub mean?

options.text: To study hard as in an all- nighter
To hit very hard on the head or neck

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: To give a name

questions.question: What does to vex mean?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: To annoy

questions.question: Although it is a galaxy, the story about its creation is not less intriguing. Many legends associate its formation with milk spilled in one way or another. However, a Mesopotamian legend explains another thing. After the deluge the ark of Utnapishtim, the Sumerian Noah, was stuck on Mount Ararat. He then made a sacrifice to the gods and this galaxy was created out of the smoke of the fire.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Milky Way

questions.question: This constellation was named after a creature from the Greek mythology which is a combination between a human and a horse. Such creatures were of violent nature but there was one exception - Chiron, who was the tutor of Hercules.

This was the instrument that Orpheus played so well that his music enchanted even the wild beasts, the rocks, and the trees. After he lost his beloved one - Eurydice, Zeus placed Orpheuss musical instrument on the sky.
If you put a hex on someone, what have you done?

options.text: Drown him or her as a witch.
Wish him or her good luck
Put him or her under a spell

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Put him or her under a spell

questions.question: Which of the following terms means to search for fun?

This constellation is often associated with Ganymede, who was a beautiful Phrygian youngster. Jupiter once saw him, fell in love with the lad and came to the earth as a bird, which took him to the skies. Since then he has served as the cup bearer of the gods.

This constellation represents the twin brothers Castor and Pollux. They were born by one mother, Leda, but had different fathers. Leda got pregnant simultaneously by Jupiter and the king Tyndarus of Sparta. When Castor died, Pollux felt so sorry that he begged Jupiter to unite them again, so Jupiter reunited the brothers in the sky.
If you command a horse to gee, what do you expect him to do?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Turn right

questions.question: There are many myths about this constellation. The earliest one, however, comes from a Sumerian legend about a female dragon, who ruled over the primordial ocean before the creation. But new gods rebelled against her and sent her to the skies.
This is a star group in Taurus. It was called after the seven daughters of the Titan Atlas and the Nymph Plieone - Alcyone, Maia, Electra, Merope, Taygeta, Celaeno, and Sterope.
What does to sup refer to?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Eat an evening meal

questions.question: This constellation was named after a Greek hero who bragged to be the greatest hunter. Goddess Hera heard that and sent a scorpion after him to test his skills. The hero was stung to death by the scorpion. Zeus felt sorry and sent him to the sky.
What does the verb hew mean?

options.text: To fasten with glue or paste

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: To cut

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Creature and Hybrid
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, sphinxes, mean. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: The hit song If I Were a Rich Man, which reflected the dreams of a poor milkman, came from which musical of the 60s?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fiddler on the Roof

questions.question: What is the name of the monstrous creature from Greek Mythology, that is the offspring of Typhon and Echidna?
Which of the following terms means to recede?
In which musical does Curly sing Surrey With the Fringe on Top to entice his girlfriend to accompany him to a party?
What kind of creature was the African mythological hybrid Jengu?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A water spirit

questions.question: What is the meaning of the verb to jam?

options.text: To interfer with a radio signal
To spread with a jelly-like substance
To soak flax prior to spinning
To unclog a bunch of logs in a stream

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: To interfer with a radio signal

questions.question: The world sirena refers to this mythical or folklore hybrid of a woman and an animal?
Which of the following is an evil mythological hybrid of a woman and a bird?
The sphinxes, the popular legendary creatures of the Ancient Egyptians, could be depicted with three different heads. Which head that was not typical for the sphinx?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Snake head

questions.question: This hybrid is an Egyptian sacred baboon with the head of a dog.
Which of the following is a legendary creature with a lion body and eagle head and wings?
What is the name of the legendary half-man and half-goat (or half-horse) creature often associated with male sexuality in Greek mythology?
What does to hie mean?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: To hurry

questions.question: The legendary creature Peryton, that was said to come from the lost continent Atlantis, is a hybrid of what two animals?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stag and bird

questions.question: Which of the following fictional or legendary hybrids is not half-human?

questions.question: The moving song I Am What I Am is sung at the end of Act I of which Jerry Herman hit show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: La Cage aux Folles

questions.question: The word catholic means the same whether capitalized or not.
What is the meaning of the adverb altogether?
Stationary is fancy writing paper.
Is counsel the correct word for a group called together for a purpose?
What does the collocation all together mean?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: In the same place

questions.question: In which show does Eliza sing The Rain in Spain?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: My Fair Lady

questions.question: Which musical of the 50s featured the song Some Enchanted Evening?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: South Pacific

questions.question: What does the word principal mean?
Whatever Lola Wants is performed by the sultry Lola trying to tempt a faithful husband in which  Bob Fosse show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Damn Yankees

questions.question: All That Jazz is the opening number of which 1975 Bob Fosse musical?
Fill in the blank with the correct word:
Stationery means fixed, not moveable.
These creatures ruled the world until they were overthrown by the Twelve Olympians, led by Zeus.
Counsel is giving of advice.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Van Rijn

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Howie Mandel

quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Creatures and Appearance
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, creatures, appearance. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which prefix means together?
All but one of the following suffixes changes the word from an adjective or a verb into a noun.  Which is the odd one?
Odins favorite pets were these creatures.
Which of the following gods was famous for his talent to quickly transform his appearance?
Which suffix means foot?
Which prefix means within?
Which suffix means fear?
What did god Tyr sacrifice in order to bind the evil Fenris wolf?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: His hand

questions.question: Which suffix means one who?

There were two major clans of Norse gods - Vanir and sir.
When prefix means high?
Freya was the goddess of this.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Love and beauty

questions.question: God Ori was a giant.
